titles.title: A bill for the relief of Benchmark Rail Group, Inc.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

calendar.text: Committee on Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Judiciary. Reported to Senate by Senator Biden without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 685.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S14075-14077)

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 9/23/1994--Introduced. Directs the Director of the Federal Emergency Management Agency to compensate a named corporation for the emergency work and services performed by them after the Northridge earthquake.
